023package org.opt4j.core.start;
024
025import java.awt.Color;
026import java.awt.Component;
027import java.awt.Point;
028import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
029import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
030import java.awt.event.MouseAdapter;
031import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.WeakHashMap;
034
035import javax.swing.BorderFactory;
036import javax.swing.JComponent;
037import javax.swing.JMenuItem;
038import javax.swing.JPopupMenu;
039import javax.swing.JProgressBar;
040import javax.swing.JTable;
041import javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel;
042import javax.swing.table.DefaultTableCellRenderer;
043import javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer;
044
045import org.opt4j.core.config.ExecutionEnvironment;
046import org.opt4j.core.config.Icons;
047import org.opt4j.core.config.PropertyModule;
048import org.opt4j.core.config.Task;
049import org.opt4j.core.config.Task.State;
050import org.opt4j.core.config.visualization.DefaultTasksPanel;
051import org.opt4j.core.config.visualization.Format;
052import org.opt4j.core.config.visualization.SelectedModules;
053import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.Control;
054import org.opt4j.core.optimizer.Optimizer;
055
056import com.google.inject.Inject;
057import com.google.inject.Module;
058
059/**
060 * The {@link Opt4JTasksPanel} extends the {@link DefaultTasksPanel} by
061 * additional functionality: Additional control and extended state.
062 * 
063 * @author lukasiewycz
064 * 
065 */
066@SuppressWarnings("serial")
067public class Opt4JTasksPanel extends DefaultTasksPanel {
068
069        protected final Map<Task, Progress> progessMap = new WeakHashMap<>();
070
071        protected final SelectedModules selectedModules;
072
073        static class ProgressRenderer extends DefaultTableCellRenderer {
074                private final JProgressBar b = new JProgressBar(0, 100);
075
076                public ProgressRenderer() {
077                        super();
078                        setOpaque(true);
079                        b.setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(1, 1, 1, 1));
080                        b.setStringPainted(true);
081                        b.setBackground(Color.WHITE);
082                }
083
084                @Override
085                public Component getTableCellRendererComponent(JTable table, Object value, boolean isSelected, boolean hasFocus,
086                                int row, int column) {
087                        if (value instanceof Progress) {
088                                Progress progress = (Progress) value;
089                                Double v = progress.get();
090                                if (v == null) {
091                                        v = 0.0;
092                                }
093                                b.setValue((int) (v * 100));
094                                b.setString("" + progress.getCurrentIteration() + "/" + progress.getMaxIterations());
095                                return b;
096                        }
097                        return super.getTableCellRendererComponent(table, value, isSelected, hasFocus, row, column);
098                }
099        }
100
101        class Table extends JTable {
102
103                /*
104                 * (non-Javadoc)
105                 * 
106                 * @see javax.swing.JTable#prepareRenderer(javax.swing.table.
107                 * TableCellRenderer , int, int)
108                 */
109                @Override
110                public Component prepareRenderer(TableCellRenderer renderer, int row, int column) {
111                        Component c = super.prepareRenderer(renderer, row, column);
112
113                        if (!(renderer instanceof ProgressRenderer)) {
114                                Task task = executionEnvironment.getTasks().get(row);
115                                if (task.getException() == null) {
116                                        c.setForeground(Color.BLACK);
117                                } else {
118                                        c.setForeground(Color.RED);
119                                }
120
121                                if (c instanceof JComponent) {
122                                        JComponent jc = (JComponent) c;
123
124                                        jc.setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(0, 3, 0, 0));
125
126                                        Object value = this.getValueAt(row, column);
127                                        if (value != null) {
128                                                char[] chars = value.toString().toCharArray();
129                                                int length = jc.getFontMetrics(jc.getFont()).charsWidth(chars, 0, chars.length);
130                                                if (this.getColumnModel().getColumn(column).getWidth() < length) {
131                                                        jc.setToolTipText(format.formatTooltip(value.toString()));
132                                                } else {
133                                                        jc.setToolTipText(null);
134                                                }
135                                        }
136                                }
137                        }
138
139                        return c;
140                }
141
142                @Override
143                public TableCellRenderer getCellRenderer(final int row, final int column) {
144                        if (column == 2) {
145                                return new ProgressRenderer();
146                        }
147                        return super.getCellRenderer(row, column);
148                }
149
150        }
151
152        /**
153         * The {@link Model} of the table.
154         */
155        protected class Model extends AbstractTableModel {
156                protected final String[] columnNames = { "Task", "State", "Progress" };
157
158                @Override
159                public int getColumnCount() {
160                        return columnNames.length;
161                }
162
163                @Override
164                public int getRowCount() {
165                        return executionEnvironment.getTasks().size();
166                }
167
168                @Override
169                public Object getValueAt(int row, int column) {
170                        Opt4JTask task = (Opt4JTask) executionEnvironment.getTasks().get(row);
171                        if (column == 0) {
172                                return row + " " + task.toString();
173                        } else if (column == 1) {
174                                if (task.getException() != null) {
175                                        return "EXCEPTION: \n" + task.getException();
176                                }
177                                try {
178                                        Control control = task.getInstance(Control.class);
179                                        return "" + control.getState();
180                                } catch (RuntimeException e) {
181                                        return "";
182                                }
183                        } else if (column == 2) {
184                                switch (task.getState()) {
185                                case EXECUTING:
186                                        Progress progress = Opt4JTasksPanel.this.progessMap.get(task);
187                                        if (progress != null) {
188                                                return progress;
189                                        }
190                                        Optimizer optimizer = task.getInstance(Optimizer.class);
191                                        if (optimizer != null) {
192                                                progress = task.getInstance(Progress.class);
193                                                optimizer.addOptimizerIterationListener(progress);
194                                                progessMap.put(task, progress);
195                                                return progress;
196                                        }
197                                        return " " + task.getState();
198                                default:
199                                        return "  " + task.getState();
200                                }
201                        }
202                        return null;
203                }
204
205                @Override
206                public String getColumnName(int i) {
207                        return columnNames[i];
208                }
209        }
210
211        /**
212         * Constructs a {@link Opt4JTasksPanel}.
213         * 
214         * @param executionEnvironment
215         *            the execution environment
216         * @param format
217         *            the format informations
218         * @param selectedModules
219         *            the selected modules
220         */
221        @Inject
222        public Opt4JTasksPanel(ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment, Format format, SelectedModules selectedModules) {
223                super(executionEnvironment, format);
224
225                this.selectedModules = selectedModules;
226        }
227
228        /*
229         * (non-Javadoc)
230         * 
231         * @see org.opt4j.conf.gui.Startupable#startup()
232         */
233        @Override
234        public void startup() {
235                super.startup();
236
237                table.getColumnModel().getColumn(0).setPreferredWidth(50);
238                table.getColumnModel().getColumn(1).setPreferredWidth(300);
239                table.getColumnModel().getColumn(2).setPreferredWidth(250);
240
241                table.addMouseListener(new PopupListener());
242        }
243
244        /*
245         * (non-Javadoc)
246         * 
247         * @see org.opt4j.config.visualization.DefaultTasksPanel#getModel()
248         */
249        @Override
250        protected AbstractTableModel getModel() {
251                return new Model();
252        }
253
254        /*
255         * (non-Javadoc)
256         * 
257         * @see org.opt4j.config.visualization.DefaultTasksPanel#getTable()
258         */
259        @Override
260        protected JTable getTable() {
261                return new Table();
262        }
263
264        /**
265         * The {@link PopupListener} for the table elements.
266         */
267        protected class PopupListener extends MouseAdapter {
268
269                /*
270                 * (non-Javadoc)
271                 * 
272                 * @see
273                 * java.awt.event.MouseAdapter#mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent)
274                 */
275                @Override
276                public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) {
277                        if (e.isPopupTrigger()) {
278                                display(e);
279                        }
280                }
281
282                /*
283                 * (non-Javadoc)
284                 * 
285                 * @see
286                 * java.awt.event.MouseAdapter#mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent)
287                 */
288                @Override
289                public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) {
290                        if (e.isPopupTrigger()) {
291                                display(e);
292                        }
293                }
294
295                /**
296                 * Displays a popup menu with controls for running tasks.
297                 * 
298                 * @param event
299                 *            the triggered event
300                 */
301                protected void display(MouseEvent event) {
302
303                        if (event.isPopupTrigger()) {
304                                try {
305                                        Point p = event.getPoint();
306                                        int row = table.rowAtPoint(p);
307
308                                        Opt4JTask task = (Opt4JTask) executionEnvironment.getTasks().get(row);
309
310                                        JPopupMenu menu = new JPopupMenu();
311                                        addConfigLoadMenuItems(menu, task);
312                                        if (task.getState() == State.EXECUTING) {
313                                                menu.addSeparator();
314                                                addControlMenuItems(menu, task);
315                                        }
316                                        menu.show(event.getComponent(), event.getX(), event.getY());
317                                } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
318                                }
319                        }
320                }
321
322                /**
323                 * Adds an item to the given menu which allows to restore the
324                 * configuration of a task.
325                 * 
326                 * @param menu
327                 *            the menu
328                 * @param task
329                 *            the task which configuration is restored
330                 */
331                private void addConfigLoadMenuItems(JPopupMenu menu, final Opt4JTask task) {
332                        JMenuItem loadConfig = new JMenuItem("Restore Configuration", Icons.getIcon(Icons.FOLDER_ADD));
333
334                        loadConfig.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
335                                @Override
336                                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
337                                        selectedModules.clear();
338                                        for (Module module : task.getModules()) {
339                                                PropertyModule pModule;
340                                                if (module instanceof PropertyModule) {
341                                                        pModule = (PropertyModule) module;
342                                                } else {
343                                                        pModule = new PropertyModule(module);
344                                                }
345
346                                                selectedModules.add(pModule);
347                                        }
348                                }
349                        });
350
351                        menu.add(loadConfig);
352                }
353
354                /**
355                 * Adds the control menu items to start, pause, stop and terminate the
356                 * given task.
357                 * 
358                 * @param menu
359                 *            the menu to enhance
360                 * @param task
361                 *            the optimization task to control
362                 */
363                private void addControlMenuItems(JPopupMenu menu, Opt4JTask task) {
364                        final Control control;
365                        try {
366                                control = task.getInstance(Control.class);
367                        } catch (RuntimeException e) {
368                                return;
369                        }
370                        assert control != null : "Task should be in state EXECUTING but is in state " + task.getState();
371
372                        JMenuItem start = new JMenuItem("Start", Icons.getIcon(Icons.CONTROL_START));
373                        JMenuItem pause = new JMenuItem("Pause", Icons.getIcon(Icons.CONTROL_PAUSE));
374                        JMenuItem stop = new JMenuItem("STOP", Icons.getIcon(Icons.CONTROL_STOP));
375                        JMenuItem terminate = new JMenuItem("Terminate", Icons.getIcon(Icons.CONTROL_TERM));
376                        terminate.addActionListener((ActionEvent e) -> control.doTerminate());
377                        start.addActionListener((ActionEvent e) -> control.doStart());
378                        pause.addActionListener((ActionEvent e) -> control.doPause());
379                        stop.addActionListener((ActionEvent e) -> control.doStop());
380
381                        if (control != null) {
382                                switch (control.getState()) {
383                                case RUNNING:
384                                        start.setEnabled(false);
385                                        break;
386                                case PAUSED:
387                                        pause.setEnabled(false);
388                                        break;
389                                case TERMINATED:
390                                        terminate.setEnabled(false);
391                                        start.setEnabled(false);
392                                        pause.setEnabled(false);
393                                        stop.setEnabled(false);
394                                        break;
395                                case STOPPED:
396                                        start.setEnabled(false);
397                                        pause.setEnabled(false);
398                                        stop.setEnabled(false);
399                                        break;
400                                default:
401                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
402                                                        "Control state " + control.getState() + " not supported by " + this);
403                                }
404                        } else {
405                                terminate.setEnabled(false);
406                                start.setEnabled(false);
407                                pause.setEnabled(false);
408                                stop.setEnabled(false);
409                        }
410
411                        menu.add(start);
412                        menu.add(pause);
413                        menu.add(stop);
414                        menu.add(terminate);
415                }
416        }
417}
